name: Rememberance (DarknessNox)
description:
Help our protagonist Clara, find out more about the mysterious house she ended up in after she died. Explore the mansion and solve riddles and puzzles together with Clara and help her on her journey!

"Clara Lloyd was born in 1902 in England. She was orphaned at a young age and found in the forests near Oxford. Her life at the orphanage wasn't easy and she was never lucky enough to be adopted into a loving family. When she was 18, Clara left the "Saint Augustine Orphanage". She always loved singing and performing so she tried to make a living with her talents. She managed to save enough money to move to Birmingham. She managed to rent a room at Madame Turner's and even negotiated to pay cheaper rent in return for cleaning up a few times per week. She was often found singing at local bars in St. Bartholomew's and for fancy events in private mansions whenever she was invited. Clara truly loved singing and her voice touched many. The "little grey bird" is what they called her. Delicate and petite, yet her voice could soothe even the raging ocean. Her last name came from the orphanage, since everyone disregarded her and she was never noticed, so it stuck and she decided to wear it with pride instead. One faithful evening while performing at the "Anchor and Mermaid" a fight broke out between rivaling city gangs. Bullets were flying, whiskey bottles were shattered into splinters and everything was loud. Clara tried to hide amidst the chaos and then... a ringing in her ears, louder than anything ever before. A single bullet to her heart. Before realizing what happened she closed her eyes and there was nothing, but darkness..."
